title: Burnt Sienna
description: Famous artist, and ex-Marine, Chase Malone is hired by wealthy arms dealer Derek Bellasar to paint a portrait of his wife, Sienna. Malone learns Bellasar has married a string of beauties--all of whom have died after their portrait was painted. Now working for the CIA to keep a biological arms deal from going down, Chase must save Sienna--and his own life.
author: David Morrell
